E

edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware - package edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware
 

G

Generator - Class in edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware
This class implements a simple passphrase generator, using a provided pool of words (specified as either a String[], a ResourceBundle, or a file Path from which words are read) and a Random instance as a source of randomness.
Generator(String[], Random) - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.Generator
Initializes Generator instance with the specified String[] word list and Random instance.
Generator(ResourceBundle, Random) - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.Generator
Initializes Generator instance with the specified ResourceBundle word list (keys are ignored) and Random instance.
Generator(Path, Random) - Constructor for class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.Generator
Initializes Generator instance with the contents of the specified Path as a word list and Random instance.

N

next() - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.Generator
Returns a randomly selected word.
next(int, boolean) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.Generator
Returns a random passphrase as a String[] of words.
next(int) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.Generator
Returns a random passphrase as a String[] of words, with no restriction on word duplication.
